```{r}
subdirectory <- "MaxFd_TR1500"
name <- paste("~/mflores/", subdirectory, sep = "")
OVFFiles <- list.files(name,pattern='OVF', full.names = T)
eventsFiles <- list.files(name,pattern='nEvents', full.names = T)

```
```{r}
#opening OVF files and binding them together
for (i in 1:length(OVFFiles)){
OVF_lists <- read.csv2(OVFFiles[i] , header = F, sep = ",")
  if (i==1){
   OVF_df <- OVF_lists
  }
  else
  {OVF_df <- rbind(OVF_df, OVF_lists) }
}
```

```{r}
for (i in 1:length(eventsFiles)){
events_lists <- read.csv2(eventsFiles[i] , header = F, sep = ",")
  if (i==1){
   events_df <- events_lists
  }
  else
  {events_df <- rbind(events_df, events_lists) }
}
```

```{r}
#build violin plots 
dp <- ggplot(events_df, aes(x="1500", y=V1 )) + 
  geom_violin(trim=FALSE)+
  geom_boxplot(width=0.1, fill="white")+
  labs(title="Efficiency achieved in Genetic algorithm",x="TR", y = "Max Fe")
dp + theme_classic()
```
